reviewText: If you want to know more about Bomb Disposal and the men that make the world a safer place for us all to live, then this video is right for you. It goes into great detail to tell the story of how Bomb Squads in the United Kingdom go about making safe areas where terrorist devices and suspect packages are found. It's a "must" for all you Military enthusiasts. I'd recommened that you get this video. It's enjoyable to watch.
